content.introduction: Anthropic just released their open-source Model Context Protocol (MCP), revolutionizing how LLMs interact with external data and tools! Here's why it matters:
key_features: Two-way connection between data sources and hosts
Open standard compatible with various LLM models
Supports both local and, in the future, cloud-based tools
Currently working with Mac & Windows Host (Claude desktop app)
Expect to see new hosts in the next few weeks
Python & TypeScript SDKs for custom development
content.conclusion: The MCP could become the fundamental protocol for building AI agents!
